issue.title: External signer: in case of error shows only "External signer failure"
issue.body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Current behaviour

Shows a dialog with title "External signer failure" and description "External signer failure".

### Expected behaviour

Report the error that is received as part of the execution result in the `error` field designated for such execution failures/errors.

### Steps to reproduce

Have an external signer perform a `signtx` (stdin) operation and report back a result that includes a body to the `error` field of the json.

### Relevant log output

N/A

### How did you obtain Bitcoin Core

Pre-built binaries

### What version of Bitcoin Core are you using?

v27.1

### Operating system and version

Fedora Linux

### Machine specifications

Basic laptop with Intel CPU. Nothing special.
